text: Christos Sartzetakis (; 6 April 1929 - 3 February 2022) was a Greek jurist and former supreme justice of the Court of Cassation. He was the President of the Third Hellenic Republic from 1985 to 1990. He was born in Neapoli, Thessaloniki in 1929. Sartzetakis died at an Athens hospital on 3 February 2022 from acute respiratory failure caused by pneumonia, aged 92. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website (In Greek) Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Chief justices Category:Presidents of Greece
title: Christos Sartzetakis
